services.servicesDescription: We offer a powerful set of B2B tools...
services.centralizedDescription: Direct access to various wholesale products from reliable manufacturers across Uzbekistan and neighboring countries.
services.crmDescription: Digitize the sales process with CRM designed for B2B operations. Track orders, manage clients and automate communication.
services.servicesIntro: At SilkLinExpo, we do more than connect buyers and sellers - we provide an integrated digital infrastructure for efficient, reliable and scalable B2B trade in Central Asia and beyond.

process.signUpDesc: Register as a manufacturer, intermediary or wholesale buyer to access the platform.
process.listProductsDesc: Create product listings or place sourcing requests to connect with reliable trade partners.
process.manageCommunicateDesc: Use built-in CRM to track leads, manage deals and communicate with clients.
process.completeDealsDesc: Select logistics and declaration options, confirm operations and develop ongoing partnerships.

team.teamDescription: Our team combines unique expertise in digital marketing, software development and international trade.

manufacturers.raxatDescription: LOTTE Raxat is one of Kazakhstan's largest chocolate and confectionery manufacturers.
manufacturers.noManufacturersFound: No manufacturers found in partner countries.
manufacturers.raxatCompanyDescription: LOTTE Raxat is one of Kazakhstan's leading confectionery manufacturers, offering over 400 products including chocolate, biscuits and sweets. Established in 1942 and now part of South Korea's LOTTE Group, it exports to CIS, Europe, USA and China.

testimonials.testimonial1: Through SilkLinExpo we established excellent cooperation with Uzbek manufacturers.
testimonials.testimonial2: The platform significantly increased our export volume.
testimonials.testimonial3: Very convenient and reliable B2B market.
testimonials.testimonial1Text: SilkLinExpo helped us find a reliable logistics partner and increase our wholesale sales in 2 weeks.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: Declaration agents and order tracking made cross-border trade much easier.
testimonials.testimonial3Text: High quality products - Flags, exceptional capabilities, programs for birthdays and occasions on paper are still basic.

pricing.bestPricingPlanDesc: At SilkLinExpo choose the perfect plan for your business needs. Each plan is designed to ensure your B2B trade success.
pricing.basicPlanDesc: Perfect for new sellers, small manufacturers or B2B trade beginners.
pricing.standardPlanDesc: For growing teams and intermediaries managing regular trade operations.
pricing.premiumPlanDesc: Designed for exporters, wholesalers and large-scale operations managing complex B2B deals.

features.warehouseStorage1Month: Warehouse storage of products up to 1 month
features.priorityAccess: Priority access to logistics and declaration agents
features.outletListing: Outlet product listing service (bulk clearance sales)
features.buyerInsights: Buyer activity insights and regional market data
features.accountManager: Dedicated account manager and priority support

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We are ready to help you with all B2B market needs. Our team is prepared to assist with product inquiries, partnership opportunities and technical support.

newsletter.title: Get everything for just $59!
newsletter.description: Creating and modifying designs comes naturally with our wide assortment. Forget coding, enjoy our themes.

sections.declarationDescription: We connect businesses with certified customs declaration agents to process legal documents for cross-border trade. Service available for negotiated fee based on agreement and shipment complexity.
sections.logisticsDescription: Benefit from partnerships with reliable logistics companies offering efficient local and international delivery services. Logistics services provided for specified service fee based on route, volume and agreement terms.
sections.promotionDescription: Promote your products with homepage placement and carousel banners for specified advertising fee. This promotion helps reach verified B2B buyers and increase brand visibility on the platform.
sections.aiChatbotDescription: AI-powered chatbot available 24/7 to assist with product information, platform navigation, order support and general inquiries - enhancing user experience for both buyers and sellers.
sections.paymentDescription: We support secure, fast transactions through integrated payment gateways, including platforms widely used in Uzbekistan and CIS region.

templates.title: Business Templates
templates.sample_template: Hello! In response to your inquiry, we offer to send a sample of our product. After reviewing the sample quality, you can place a full order. If additional information is needed for sample shipment, let us know. Thank you!
templates.payment_template:
Hello! Your order is ready. We are sending the following details for payment:

• Order Number: [ORDER_NUMBER]
• Payment Amount: [AMOUNT]
• Payment Method: [PAYMENT_METHOD]

Please check the payment details and confirm. If you have questions, contact us. Thank you!
